author: Barry Morgan
comment: This app and others just stopped working when Android wear was updated shame. Task manager is the way to go now for me they sussed it! Update :Thanks for the reply, reinstalled and working perfectly and very happy 😊

reply.author: Abdulla Eqab
reply.content: I have just released an update to support the latest Android Wear version, it may take few hours to be pushed to users :) Sorry for any inconvenience

title: Was a really good app...

author: Anders von Reis Crooks
comment: As long as the developer keeps it updated, it can be a real help when your watch starts bogging down. If there was a task manager that could kill individual apps, I would six star this.
title: Works well

author: Matthew Wood
comment: Sped up my moto 360 2nd gen really well, hoping that they could add a auto ram clean up so that the device stays smooth all the time, by releasing ram when watch has stopped being used for a length of time that would be great!
title: Great

author: David VanDyne
comment: Hooray! Works beautifully on 5.1.1 now. I knew you could do it! Way to go Dev.!

author: iLinux 7
comment: Easy to use. Helps alot! Thank you
title: Nice App

author: Robert
comment: This app should have came standard on Android Wear. This is the next best thing to a full on Task Manager (who knows maybe the next update?). Definitely worth the dollar great job on this all and the other 2!
title: Great app

author: Wilson Cordero
comment: Great to clear up my clutter
title: Works fast

author: Dave Barrett
comment: Not working since latest android wear update Aug2015

reply.author: Abdulla Eqab
reply.content: I have just released an update to support the latest Android Wear version, it may take few hours to be pushed to users :) Sorry for any inconvenience

title: Boost

author: Jake Powell
comment: Took 19 hours to sync to my watch. Moto 360

reply.author: Abdulla Eqab
reply.content:
The synchronisation of apps to the watch totally depend on the "Android Wear" main app. You can click on resync option on the Android Wear app to resync directly.

Regards,

title: Could be better
